name: ListScheduleAuditRecords
description:
Retrieve sorted audit records for a specific schedule.

Fetches audit records for a particular schedule identified by its ID, sorted by the execution time from newest to oldest. Useful for monitoring changes in schedule configurations or activities. Requires OAuth with 'audit_records.read' scope for authorization. Supports cursor-based pagination for large datasets.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the schedule resource to retrieve audit records for.
